Package oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits

Class PassageLinkObject

java.lang.Object
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.AbstractObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.EditModelObject
oh_hecc.mvc.model_bits.PassageLinkObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickableObject, DrawableObject, ObjectWithAPosition, UpdatableObject
public class PassageLinkObject extends EditModelObject
Okay so this is basically an object that represents a link from one PassageObject to another.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    (package private) void
    individualDraw​(Graphics2D g)
    Basically rotates the affine transformation so the point triangle is pointing in the right direction, then draws the point triangle to point to the object that this links to
    (package private) void
    individualUpdate()
    updates the position of where this object should point from/to, as well as the length of the actual pointy arrow thing, in response to either the object it points from or to moving.

  • Constructor Details

    • PassageLinkObject

      PassageLinkObject​(EditModelInterface model, ObjectWithAPositionAndUUID sourceObject, UUID destinationUUID)
      Constructor for the PassageLinkObject
      Parameters:
      model - the EditModelInterface object that this object appears in
      sourceObject - the source PassageObject that this 'link' is 'from'.
      destinationUUID - the UUID of the PassageEditingInterface/PassageObject that this 'link' effectively 'links' to.

  • Method Details

    • individualUpdate

      void individualUpdate()
      updates the position of where this object should point from/to, as well as the length of the actual pointy arrow thing, in response to either the object it points from or to moving.
      Specified by:
      individualUpdate in class AbstractObject

    • individualDraw

      void individualDraw​(Graphics2D g)
      Basically rotates the affine transformation so the point triangle is pointing in the right direction, then draws the point triangle to point to the object that this links to
      Specified by:
      individualDraw in class AbstractObject
      Parameters:
      g - the graphics context being used.
